content: @Mark Braunstein has published a good commentary on the 1000 clicks article from last week

Don Rucker has further comment on the article along with a great Q&A that includes this gem:

Without giving too much away, are you able to offer a bit of a sneak peak of the tone and tenor of some of the comments on the proposed rule so far? What were you hearing from various stakeholders at HIMSS19 immediately after the rules was published on February 11?

A. Well, with the comment period ending on May 3rd, most of these comments will tend to come in around four o'clock that afternoon.
@Grahame Grieve got a link to Rucker's?? I'll reply to him with Mark's piece.

@Dave deBronkart I (and probably others) posted this in the #Announcements stream:
https://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/onc-chief-don-rucker-current-state-and-next-frontier-interoperability
